dmca.title: DMCA ISP Notification 1st Follow-up www.bestbuypcs.com /Sony Mobile
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 20, 2007 8:39 AM
To: Copyright
Cc: john@bestbuypcs.com
Subject: DMCA ISP Notification 1st Follow-up www.bestbuypcs.com /Sony Mobile

To whom it may concern,

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your
client www.bestbuypcs.com and our client Sony Mobile. Your client received a DMCA
Notification informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and
trademarked logos. They received this letter on 4/4/2007 and were given eight (8)
days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am showing your client has yet
to comply.  I have pasted all infringing URL's and a copy of the original Cease and
Desist letter to better assist in reaching compliance.  Please provide me with a
follow-up on this by 04/23/2007.  If you have any questions please do not hesitate
to contact me via email at Bdavis@netenforcers.com.

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=1955&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2018&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2127&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2129&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2131&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2133&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2126&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2123&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=1970&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=1963&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=1972&cat=SUB270&catstr=

http://www.bestbuypcs.com/store/ccp51/cp-app.cgi?usr=51G4095648&rnd=7827375&rrc=N&affl=&cip=&act=&aff=&pg=prod&ref=2132&cat=SUB270&catstr=

 
Sincerely,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis 
Sent: Friday, April 06, 2007 12:44 PM
To: 'copyright@theplanet.com'
Subject: FW: [Ticket#2007040510001719] DMCA ISP Notification www.bespbuypcs.com
/Sony Mobile [ThePl [...]

4/4/2007 

Gabay Moses
1621-25 Old York Rd
Abington PA 19001

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

Dear Sir or Madam:

Sony has retained Net Enforcers, Inc. to assist with the protection and enforcement
of Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted material
(referred to in this letter as "Sony Works").   Net Enforcers has in turn retained
us to contact you with respect to this matter.  

Sony believes that you have infringed upon its intellectual property rights by
performing or allowing to be performed some or all of the following actions,
specifically with respect to Mobile products sold by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging
Division : (1) improperly obtaining a copy of the Sony Works; (2) creating
derivative works from Sony Works; (3) illegally reproducing the Sony Works; (4)
illegally distributing the Sony Works; (5) illegally utilizing Sony's trademarks in
violation of 15 U.S.C.
